items.title: FPIs take out Rs 58,711 cr from equities in Oct on geopolitical crisis
items.description: The outflow came following a nine-month high investment of Rs 57,724 crore in September

items.title: Mcap of 7 of top-10 most valued firms erode by Rs 1.22 trn; TCS, RIL lag
items.description: The valuation of Reliance Industries slumped Rs 21,351.71 crore to Rs 18,55,366.53 crore

items.title: Corporate earnings, inflation data key factors to drive markets: Analysts
items.description: Moreover, markets would also focus on movement in crude oil prices amid geopolitical tensions, experts added
